# Supportability Training Website

## Project Overview
Next.js 16 website for team training on supportability concepts and professional communication principles for client-facing technical teams.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

## Project Structure
- `/src/app/page.tsx` - Homepage with overview
- `/src/app/introduction/` - Introduction to supportability
- `/src/app/core-principles/` - 7 foundational principles
- `/src/app/best-practices/` - Practical techniques and methods
- `/src/app/examples/` - Workshop notes and real-world insights
- `/src/app/resources/` - Quick reference guides and checklists
- `/src/components/` - Reusable React components (Navigation, Card, Footer)

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start development server on http://localhost:3000
- Run `npm run build` to create production build
- All content is editable in the page.tsx files

## Completed Setup
✅ Project scaffolded with Next.js 16
✅ All training pages created with content
✅ Navigation and layout components implemented
✅ Tailwind CSS styling applied
✅ TypeScript configured
✅ Development server running
✅ Documentation updated
